definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
bamboo or wooden spear/Kangxi radical 79, occurring in 段, 毅, 殺 etc
to kill oneself/to commit suicide/to attempt suicide

sentences.english: In that night was Belshazzar the king of the Chaldeans slain.
sentences.chinese: 當夜，迦勒底王伯沙撒被殺。

sentences.english: Suddenly the hero's son picked up a knife and killed the dragon.
sentences.chinese: 突然英雄的兒子拿起刀殺了龍。

sentences.english: The potential of oils as new types of larvicides for the control of mosquitoes are explored.
sentences.chinese: 這兩種油品可開發用作防治蚊蟲的新型殺幼蟲藥劑。

sentences.english: It's carrion! Who killed that man?
sentences.chinese: 不過是一具腐爛的屍體罷了，誰殺了這個人？

sentences.english: The second emperor committed suicide; Zhao Gao eventually was killed.
sentences.chinese: 秦朝第二個皇帝自盡而死，趙高被殺。

sentences.english: But Rappaccini's medicine has also killed many people.
sentences.chinese: 但是拉帕奇尼的藥也殺了很多人。

sentences.english: The next day, Kenzo was killed and Akimi disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，健三被殺身亡，雅美也不見了蹤影。

sentences.english: Housework done properly can kill you.
sentences.chinese: 適當地幹家務活會殺了你。

sentences.english: And at that time forty-two thousand of Ephraim fell.
sentences.chinese: 那時以法蓮人被殺的有四萬二千。

sentences.english: Turn in your gun, or I will kill you.
sentences.chinese: 把槍交出來，否則我會殺了你。

sentences.english: The king's men had been subverted and they killed him in the night.
sentences.chinese: 國王的屬下已被策反，在夜裏把國王殺了。

sentences.english: On that day the number of those that were slain in Shushan the palace was brought before the king.
sentences.chinese: 當日，將書珊城被殺的人數呈在王前。

sentences.english: Chinese man gets death penalty for murdering 13.
sentences.chinese: 殺13人通緝犯成瑞龍佛山獲死刑。

sentences.english: These were the first spermicides on condoms.18
sentences.chinese: 並且在避孕套中首次用了殺精藥。

sentences.english: We’ll need to be in the final if we want the trophy.
sentences.chinese: 要拿大耳朵獎盃的話，我們必須殺進決賽。

sentences.english: Yue not the cluster to kill all the teach disciple.
sentences.chinese: 嶽不羣殺了所有魔教弟子。

definition: to behead (as form of capital punishment)/to chop
to fight over/to rush/to scramble/to grab/to rob/to snatch
to kill oneself/to commit suicide/to attempt suicide
enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
